Name: Oooh Ginger
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered crystallised ginger.
Review: Subtle ginger spice flavours this dry tequila martini-esque cocktail.
History: Created in March 2008 by Dick Bradsell and yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Oooh Ginger contains 213 calories
